title: A Matter of Chance Episode 6
brief_description: One of a series which looks at the problems and aspirations of the disabled. Anne Deveson talks to John Baldwin, who suffers from cerebral palsy. He lives an extraordinary life, full of drive and energy, and is outspoken about the problems faced by disabled people
